text: dharmikateyu, nivu (aradhanegagi) nim'ma mukhagalannu purvadedege tirugisuviro pascimadedege tirugisuviro embudarallilla. Nijavagi obba vyakti allahanalli, paralokadalli, malakâ€Œgalalli, granthadalli mattu pravadigalalli nambike ittu, avana pritiyannu sampadisalikkagi tanna sampattannu bandhugalu, anatharu, badavaru, prayanikaru mattu yacakarigagi hagu dasyadalliruvavara vimocanegagi kharcu madutta, namajhannu palisutta, jhakat annu pavatisutta iruvudu mattu kararu madida mele tam'ma kararina palakaragiruvudu hagu sankastadalllu kathinyadallu horatada veleyu sahanasilaragiruvude nijavada dharmikateyagide. Anthavare nijavada satyavantaru mattu anthavare nijavada devabhaktaru
